com.vaadin.addon.charts.model
Class Legend

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.AbstractConfigurationObject
      com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.Legend
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LegendStyle
public class Legend
extends AbstractConfigurationObject

The legend is a box containing a symbol and name for each series item or point item in the chart.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

getItemHoverStyle

public Style getItemHoverStyle()
Returns:
The item style when hovering
See Also:
setItemHoverStyle(Style)

setItemHoverStyle

public void setItemHoverStyle(Style itemHoverStyle)
Sets the CSS styles for each legend item when hovering over it. Properties are inherited from style unless overridden here. Defaults to: itemHoverStyle: { color: '#000' }

Parameters:
itemHoverStyle -

getItemHiddenStyle

public Style getItemHiddenStyle()
Returns:
The item style when the corresponding series or point is hidden
See Also:
setItemHiddenStyle(Style)

setItemHiddenStyle

public void setItemHiddenStyle(Style itemHiddenStyle)
Sets the CSS styles for each legend item when the corresponding series or point is hidden. Properties are inherited from style unless overridden here. Defaults to: itemHiddenStyle: { color: '#CCC' }

Parameters:
itemHiddenStyle - Item style

getLayout

public LayoutDirection getLayout()
See Also:
setLayout(LayoutDirection)

setLayout

public void setLayout(LayoutDirection layout)
Sets the layout of the legend items. Defaults to LayoutDirection.HORIZONTAL.

getHorizontalAlign

public HorizontalAlign getHorizontalAlign()
See Also:
setHorizontalAlign(HorizontalAlign)

setHorizontalAlign

public void setHorizontalAlign(HorizontalAlign horizontalAlign)
Sets the horizontal alignment of the legend box within the chart area. Defaults to HorizontalAlign.CENTER.

getVerticalAlign

public VerticalAlign getVerticalAlign()
See Also:
setVerticalAlign(VerticalAlign)

setVerticalAlign

public void setVerticalAlign(VerticalAlign verticalAlign)
Sets the vertical alignment of the legend box. The vertical position can be further determined by the y option. Defaults to VerticalAlign.BOTTOM.

getX

public Number getX()
See Also:
setX(Number)

setX

public void setX(Number x)
Sets the X offset of the legend relative to it's horizontal alignment within chart.spacingLeft and chart.spacingRight. A negative value for X moves it to the left, positive value moves it to the right. The default value of 15 together with HorizontalAlign.CENTER puts it in the center of the plot area. Defaults to 0.

Parameters:
x -

getY

public Number getY()
See Also:
setY(Number)

setY

public void setY(Number y)
Sets the vertical offset of the legend relative to it's vertical alignment within chart.spacingTop and chart.spacingBottom. A negative value for Y moves it up, while a positive value moves it down. Defaults to 0.

Parameters:
y -

isFloating

public boolean isFloating()
See Also:
setFloating(Boolean)

setFloating

public void setFloating(Boolean floating)
Sets whether the legend is floating or not. When the legend is floating, the plot area ignores it and is allowed to be placed below it. Defaults to false.

Parameters:
floating -

getBorderWidth

public Number getBorderWidth()
See Also:
setBorderWidth(Number)

setBorderWidth

public void setBorderWidth(Number borderWidth)
Sets the width of the border drawn around the legend. Defaults to 1.

getBackgroundColor

public Color getBackgroundColor()
See Also:
setBackgroundColor(String)

setBackgroundColor

public void setBackgroundColor(Color backgroundColor)
Sets the background color of the legend, filling the rounded corner border. Defaults to null.

setBackgroundColor

public void setBackgroundColor(String backgroundColor)
Sets the background color of the legend, filling the rounded corner border. Defaults to null.

isShadow

public boolean isShadow()
See Also:
setShadow(Boolean)

setShadow

public void setShadow(Boolean shadow)
Sets whether to apply a drop shadow to the legend. A backgroundColor also needs to be applied for this to take effect. Defaults to false.

The color of the border or null if not defined

The border radius or null if not defined

setBorderRadius

public void setBorderRadius(Number borderRadius)
Sets the corner radius of border of the legend. Defaults to 5.

Parameters:
borderRadius -

setEnabled

public void setEnabled(Boolean enabled)
Enable or disable the legend. Defaults to true.

Parameters:

isReversed

public boolean isReversed()
Returns:
true if the order of items is reversed or null if undefined.
See Also:
#setReversed()

setReversed

public void setReversed(Boolean reversed)
Sets whether to reverse the order of the legend items compared to the order of the series or points as defined in the configuration object. Defaults to false.

Parameters:
reversed -

setItemStyle

public void setItemStyle(Style itemStyle)
Sets the CSS styles for all legend items. Defaults to: itemStyle: { cursor: 'pointer', color: '#3E576F' }

Parameters:
itemStyle -

getItemStyle

public Style getItemStyle()
See Also:
setItemStyle(Style)

setStyle

public void setStyle(Style style)
Sets the CSS styles for the legend area. In Highcharts 1.x versions the position of the legend area was determined by CSS. In 2.x, the position is determined by properties like align, verticalAlign, x and y, but the styles are still parsed for backwards compatibility.

Parameters:
style -

getStyle

public Style getStyle()
See Also:
setStyle(Style)
